ygData.subject: RE: Observations: Upper & Lower Guk
ygData.msgSnippet: ... [snip] This is very difficult to begin with.  So difficult (and risky, depending upon what you re fighting), that I find it much more preferable to stand
ygData.messageBody:
> Perhaps the new patch will help me, but I have a very
> difficult time with
> Charm. I've played with it in East Commonlands against the
> orcs there and
> just can't seem to get the hang of knowing when to recharm the mob.
> Switching between targetting my charmed mob and the one I'm
> fighting is
> extremely difficult since I can't seem to get F1 to work as
> advertised for
> switching pet/mob.

[snip]

This is very difficult to begin with. So difficult (and risky, depending
upon what you're fighting), that I find it much more preferable to stand at
distance and let the two combatants duke it out - then I wade in and polish
off the "winner". Done correctly you should get the EXP for both.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]
